reviewText: Evening Shade is a great show season 1 is very funny. Please release the other seasons perhaps Shout Factory would like to take this project over ?!? The show is being aired on Antenna TV now 2018 but at 3:30 AM and they are showing All the seasons !!!
Release the series already!  We wanna see them!
Come on Paramount release the rest of the series ! It was a great program. Please

Evening Shade is a great series with what had to be the greatest cast for an ensemble comedy ever. Burt Reynolds..Marilu Henner..Charles Durning..Hal Holbrook..Ossie Davis..Elizabeth Ashley..Ann Wedgeworth...WOW ! The series formula is much like The Andy Griffith Show. Small town life..Burt is mostly the straight man to the eccentric residents of the town. This series has enough good episodes to be well worth the money..Evening Shade - Season One

Season 2 hasn't been released, yet all of the reviews are 5 stars based on season 1. I'm sure we won't be disappointed when we actually get to SEE season 2. This show did have the perfect cast of characters. I just wish it had gone on for many more years.

I saw this series when it was on TV and loved it!  I bought the first season and loved it again.  The humor and blend of characters is perfect.  Some of the lines are so clever and I find myself chuckling all the time.  I have been waiting over a year for the second season.  I keep wondering what is keeping the second season from being released. I am ready for some more Evening Shade humor.

I watched Evening Shade when it was first on TV and enjoyed it immensely. I have purchased Season 1 and shared it with my husband who didn't watch it during it's first run on TV and we're anxiously awaiting the remainder of the seasons. Where are they? They can't come out soon enough for us.

I didn't watch this show when it was first on tv.  My husband loved it and I bought if for him.  I have enjoyed watching this show so much that I can't wait until the next season becomes available.  I haven't laughed so much at a tv show in a very long time!  I am now a Burt Reynolds fan:-)
I have seen all of these shows on TV when it was first aird. The programs were wonderful at the time. I bought the 1st season & I know the 2nd season will be also.
